revised_title: Observations on the Continuity of Nerve Fibers in Voluntary Muscle
tldr: Lionel S. Beale investigates the continuity of nerve fibers in voluntary muscle using the mylo-hyoid of the little green tree-frog (Hyla arborea). He demonstrates that fine nucleated nerve fibers can be traced over long distances, contradicting the views of Kiihne and Kolliker.
